spark
类 Request

java.lang.Object
  spark.Request

public class Request
extends Object

Provides information about the HTTP request

作者：
Per Wendel

方法摘要
 Object attribute(String attribute)
          Gets the value of the provided attribute
 void attribute(String attribute, Object value)
          Sets an attribute on the request (can be fetched in filters/routes later in the chain)

          Returns all attributes

          Returns the request body sent by the client

          Returns the length of request.body

          Returns the content type of the body

          Returns all headers

          Returns the value of the provided header

          Returns the client's IP address

          Returns the value of the provided route pattern parameter.
 String pathInfo()
          Returns the path info Example return: "/example/foo"
 int port()
          Returns the server port
 Set<String> queryParams()
          Returns all query parameters
 String queryParams(String queryParam)
          Returns the value of the provided queryParam Example: query parameter 'id' from the following request URI: /hello?

          Returns the query string

          Gets the raw HttpServletRequest object handed in by Jetty

构造方法详细信息

Request

protected Request()
方法详细信息

params

public String params(String param)
Returns the value of the provided route pattern parameter. Example: parameter 'name' from the following pattern: (get '/hello/:name')

返回：
null if the given param is null or not found

requestMethod

public String requestMethod()
Returns request method e.g. GET, POST, PUT, ...

scheme

public String scheme()
Returns the scheme

host

public String host()
Returns the host

userAgent

public String userAgent()
Returns the user-agent

port

public int port()
Returns the server port

pathInfo

public String pathInfo()
Returns the path info Example return: "/example/foo"

url

public String url()
Returns the URL string

contentType

public String contentType()
Returns the content type of the body

ip

public String ip()
Returns the client's IP address

body

public String body()
Returns the request body sent by the client

contentLength

public int contentLength()
Returns the length of request.body

queryParams

public String queryParams(String queryParam)
Returns the value of the provided queryParam Example: query parameter 'id' from the following request URI: /hello?id=foo

headers

public String headers(String header)
Returns the value of the provided header

queryParams

public Set<String> queryParams()
Returns all query parameters

headers

public Set<String> headers()
Returns all headers

queryString

public String queryString()
Returns the query string

attribute

public void attribute(String attribute,
                      Object value)
Sets an attribute on the request (can be fetched in filters/routes later in the chain)

参数：
attribute - The attribute
value - The attribute value

attribute

public Object attribute(String attribute)
Gets the value of the provided attribute

参数：
attribute - The attribute value or null if not present

attributes

public Set<String> attributes()
Returns all attributes

public javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest raw()
Gets the raw HttpServletRequest object handed in by Jetty
